parallel --dryrun -j 12 "sbatch -J map -N 1 --wrap \"cutadapt -u 1 -o  {.}_trim.fastq.gz {} \"" ::: *.fastq.gz

for fastq_guess, guess2, perfect, perfect2:
trimming off the first letter so that it can be merged with fastq_guess3 which has a primer that includes the 5'G.

rename .fastq_trim _trim *trim*

then combining:
cat fastq_guess/ATTACTCG_AGGCTATA_1_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess2/ATTACTCG_AGGCTATA_1_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess3/ATTACTCG_AGGCTATA_1.fastq.gz fastq_perfect/220927Van_D22-243002_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz fastq_perfect2/220927Van_D22-243002_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz > combined_fastq/BD354_combined_sample_1.fastq.gz
cat fastq_guess/TCCGGAGA_GCCTCTAT_2_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess2/TCCGGAGA_GCCTCTAT_2_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess3/TCCGGAGA_GCCTCTAT_2.fastq.gz fastq_perfect/220927Van_D22-243003_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz fastq_perfect2/220927Van_D22-243003_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz > combined_fastq/BD354_combined_sample_2.fastq.gz
cat fastq_guess/CGCTCATT_AGGATAGG_3_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess2/CGCTCATT_AGGATAGG_3_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess3/CGCTCATT_AGGATAGG_3.fastq.gz fastq_perfect/220927Van_D22-243004_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz fastq_perfect2/220927Van_D22-243004_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz > combined_fastq/BD354_combined_sample_3.fastq.gz
cat fastq_guess/GAGATTCC_TCAGAGCC_4_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess2/GAGATTCC_TCAGAGCC_4_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess3/GAGATTCC_TCAGAGCC_4.fastq.gz fastq_perfect/220927Van_D22-243005_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz fastq_perfect2/220927Van_D22-243005_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz > combined_fastq/BD354_combined_sample_4.fastq.gz
cat fastq_guess/ATTCAGAA_CTTCGCCT_5_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess2/ATTCAGAA_CTTCGCCT_5_trim.fastq.gz fastq_guess3/ATTCAGAA_CTTCGCCT_5.fastq.gz fastq_perfect/220927Van_D22-243006_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz fastq_perfect2/220927Van_D22-243006_NA_sequence_trim.fastq.gz > combined_fastq/BD354_combined_sample_5.fastq.gz
